name: Silent Forest - Find Password
description:
Min Sys Req: Gtx 550TI. Intel Core 2 Quad

In this game you owing find password of door. If you find all numbers and opened door. You win! You can buy objects in shop, This object can help you. Find coins and buy this. If you download game, you cool!You can contact with me. My telegram id: @greedile. Thank You. Please rate and comment! Go to my rus telegram channel: https://t.me/yamatotanokami
